alert.note: Alert for Vance; Warren (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 27 at 3:53PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Vance and northern Warren Counties through 500 PM EDT... At 353 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Norlina, or near Warrenton, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Norlina, Macon, Drewry, Bullocksville, Kerr Lake, Wise, Lake Gaston, Southpointe And Morningstar Marinas and John H Kerr Reservoir. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
